objects.text: • Premium Silk • Wedding Collection • With Blouse Piece

product_details.name: Sugathari Women's Banarasi Saree Pure Kanjivaram Silk Saree Soft new ladies 2023 Design Wear Pattu Sarees Latest Cotton Party Sari collections With Blouse Piece for Wedding sadi (PARI 164 WINE)
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 37 x 27 x 10 cm; 429 g. Country of Origin: India. Department: Womens. Item Weight: 429 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 37 x 27 x 10 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1.00 count. Generic Name: banarasi silk jecquard woven sarees. Customer Reviews: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 336 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant fashion banner showcases a premium ethnic wear product in a circular frame at the center. The banner uses a deep maroon-to-burgundy radial gradient background complemented by abstract curved shapes and golden decorative accents around the edges. The top features a large, stylish serif heading ("heading") in a bright gold hue, followed by a smaller white subheading ("subheading") with a luxurious font below it. A bold circular price tag on the right ("price") uses a gold gradient with maroon text. Near the bottom, a white colored descriptive text line ("description") outlines the product highlights. A vibrant gold call-to-action button ("cta_button") with centered maroon text ("cta") encourages shopping. 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Burgundy: `#5E0A2A`
- Royal Maroon: `#8E0E40`
- Gold: `#FFD700`
- Dark Gold: `#DAA520`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a traditional Indian bridal look, dominated by a vibrant and regal color palette. The primary color used is a luxurious **Royal Magenta (#8D1A73)** in the saree, beautifully complemented by **Metallic Gold (#D4AF37)** zari work. The jewelry echoes the same golden hue, enhancing the opulence. Red bangles in **Classic Crimson (#B11B24)** add a bold contrast while harmonizing with the magenta base. The floral hair embellishments use **Ivory White (#FFFFF0)** to soften the look. This color mix is rich, elegant, and royal, ideal for an advertisement banner focusing on heritage, celebration, and luxury.
